parents suck.. they should get stabbed

i heard the sound of your bike,
as your wheels hit the gravel,
then your engine in the driveway 
cutting off
and i pushed through the screen door
and i stood out on the porch
thinking figh, fight, fight
at all costs, 
but instead i let you in, 
just like i've always done
and i sat you down and offered you a beer
and across the kitchen table 
i fired several rounds,
but you were still sitting here 
when the smoke cleared.
and you came crawling back 
to say that you wanna
make good in the end

and oh, oh, 
let me count the ways 
that i abhore you,
and you were never a good lay
and you were never a good friend
but, oh, oh, what else can i say...
i adore you

this will be 2 days in a row now that i have gotten up for no reason, i swear im about to snap the fuck out. she changes the schedule and expects me to see it when i obviously havent been there to look at it. so now im awake and really really bitchy cuz i got like no sleep, i just layed there, and the sleep i did get was half retarted considering i was dreaming about some people and me floating on boxes and dodging waterfalls to get away from fish and some guy.. who knows
right now i want to scream.. today is come down day, i think if i go back to bed i may never arise to see the sun at all, and that would mean i'd miss work, oh damn. so either i find something to do online, or i go back to bed and snap again when its time to get up lol.
i think i may do the last of this even tho i wasnt planning on it at the moment i think i may need it.

so if i have been a cunt lately, its my bad, this has just been a crazy week, i think i have been more than nice to all though except maybe my family, but thats cuz they are them.

yeah im going to find something to do online.. 
later

i am so fucking dead. i dont know what to do with myself im so dead. i spent all last night and today to find a ride to get my charger back, and then i take it somewhere else and leave it there too. fucking christ im retarted. i said i was going straight to bed when i got home.. that worked well.. i also said i was making a new journal today, then i just sat there and stared at the box for username and couldnt think of anything.. so im still here until i come back to life someday. i have to work at 530 in the morning, how that will work im not sure. i think i might get fired cuz my boss is evil, it just blows my mind how this woman operates. but i guess im either paranoid as hell or i am just a shit employee. i know i have been for the last week. but damn gina

anyways thats my ramblings for the night, i have to try to be a little rested for work tomorrow..
fairwell
-Lex

lame
constantly i am thinking of cds i would kill to have. i have a comp now, and i cant think of any that arent obvious and that someone i know has. so if anyone wants to lend me a hand and tell me some good tunes to download it would be greatly appreciated.
anyways, im off to create my new lj for real this time.. so later to those of you who will be added,
comment if you want to stay <3

i put my trust in my friends.. shouldnt i be able to do that?
i do everything for them.. 
then drugs come into play.. they tell u u can trust them.. and then u pass out.. and its all gone..
oh ill pay u tues..
even though she already owes me 300 bucks..
so what.. thats like 500 now?
ill never see half of it.. i hate everyone.. i hope everyone understands that life is only wha tyou make of it.. until u trust  someone 


AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

I come home dying to piss and bathe..
im bitchy from 4 days of drugs and a blur..
and then i come to find.. im locked out..
jesus christ.. 
i spend 20 minutes bitching and finally i piss in the basement toilet.. i have no idea if it works or not.. hopefully it does...
20 mins after that i finally find my dads truck keys..

get in the house.. im so sick.. i take a shower.. lay down for a minute.. i cant even concentrate on shit im so burnt out..
THEN
she calls me.. bawling.. cuz her man is being a fuck..
THEN
i ask if she has my $$
she starts crying more and tells me "i-i-i couldnt stop lex.. im sorry.. ill have ur money tues..."
WHAT THE FUCK IS THAT!
FRIEND??? I THINK NOT!!

wow.. i have no energy left.. i am just dead in this spot i think... the last 3 days of my life are a blur.. so dont ask to many questions.. lol
its so weird to have a comp sitting here again.. hmm..
i went and spent about a thousand bucks on clothes the last few days.. so now im set in that dept.. for a couple days lol.
im getting rid of the old ones to those of you who might want some of them..
well i know i never write a whole lot,.. but im not gonna now either.. later yo
-Lex.

i cant wait for this weekend
mothers day will be the best ever
as you all know, i stole and pawned my moms computer last aug. for coke and party money on my bday.. yeah stupid
so for mothers day, i will be getting her a brand new comp w/the works, i cant wait to see her face...

not only that, but i will have $ to have fun this weekend as well.. it should be GREAT!
so i will talk to all my old friends in a few days on the net.. cant wait
later
-lex

so im most likely going to be making a new journal.. 
if u wish to be on my friends list just send me a msg and i shall keep you

so wow.. they have tatu on this comp.. havent heard this in ages.. neat

i am seeing more and more every day that dixon and the drama that it consists of is not all there is.. and i like it

i didnt spend any money on drugs this check.. god thats awesome.. i still have money. that never happens.
yes im proud, and yes im bragging about it, so deal.

anyways, enough rambling.. oh wait.. its a journal, thats what im supposed to do right?
if not, then i guess i have been doing this wrong for quite some time now.

so yesterday was this mary kay party thingy.. it was weird, but at least my face is soft now. and it didnt involve makeup thank goodness.

i got to sleep till noon today.. that rocked.
i dont have to work till 11 tomorrow.. that rocks more
but then its 530 once again on tues.. but hey its not 5 days in a row at least..

anyways, i have nothing worth writing about, so ig uess this shall be the end of it.
enjoy another page of ramblings

hey yall
im just sitting here drinking a leinenkugel's honey weiss
mmmm
beer rules
so today ROCKED! i got my check first of all, a day late, but another breath allowed.
i went to patty hummels shop(a small insense/body jewelry type shop in town)
then went home..
i walked in the house all bored and shit
trying to distract myself from the thought of drugs
and i walk in
and i look and Jen was on my couch
i had to look twice.. it was insanity i tell you
didnt see that one coming
so now im hanging out w/her and her roomie
they are kik ass.
i havent seen my jen in so long
this rules!
anyways, i just wanted to update, say im doing good, im not dead, in fact im more alive than ever
so yay for that
and i still work at bk.. its cool, i love pretty much all the people i work with..

only 1 prob in life
i cant find the Archenemy cd dammit!
i wont stop until its in my hands,, ill pay bank for it if i have too
i neeeed it
i <3 them.

so i worked my first day at burger king today, and second and dq, its going good, i think this will work out perfectly.. variety is definitly a plus.. i cant write long, my mom is on her way to pick up me and paula at the library, so i just thought id say im doing great, the jobs are going swell, and i havent killed anyone yet. oh and im not moving out of my moms house bc i dont want to have to not have much cash.. so now ill have money to blow on me and everyone else for once, joyous days are a comin i can smell it in the cash..
later homies and ppl who dont like me but still keep me on their for some reason..
-lex
  +

ps, libby, fucking call me already dammit.

I did write all of you back! I promise, i just cant get stamps until tomorrow, the letters have been waiting to find you for quite some time now.. but you will recieve them begining of next week, so have no fear, and dont hate me for being slow, im buying 2 books of stamps tomorrow, so i neednt worry for a while!

Lex-
 +

wow.. so today has been the greatest day this week .. a lot of suspense though
i had a docs appt. and had to tell him i quit taking my meds.. he tried to send me to the psych unit, and i was like shut the fuck up im fine, so he said just to come back in a month.

then my mom took me to gordmans to 'look around' and she ended up getting me new pants.. *fuckin right!
then stopped at Trishas house to see her for a few(was in rehab w/her) shes coming to stay saturday and possibly friday to hang out and shit.. i cant wait!
then i had to stop at the lodge to see if i had mail, which i didnt! dammit all, but at least i was able to tell them to forward it if i get any so now i dont have to go there once a week to check.

then i came back to dixon, i had an interview at dairy queen, and when i got there the owner/manager had gone home sick, but one of the ladys there told me "welcome to the team" which means he said he was hiring me.. so yay! a job!
and then burger king is supposed to call me tomorrow, so hopefully that works out, thats 2 jobs, which = more money.. and im awaiting a call back from shopko, thats a 3rd shift job, so if that comes through then its gonna be dq and shopko.. cuz bk is a last choice kinda thing.. id love to keep all 3, but i dont think they would all want to work around eachother.

then i had to go to the health dept.. paps suck, god, i just wanted to smack her for violating me, but i dont have breast cancer or ovarian sists which is good, and ill know in a week about the std test she did.. im sure its ok too, but its always good to be reassured.

*happy sigh, only one thing could make my day even greater than its been..
and im sure we all know what, or should i say who, im speaking of, or at least kindof.

anyways, i just thought id update and say that things are looking up more and more by the minute..

Lex-
 +

now that i am able to update my journal.
life is good, i never thought id say that.
the irony of all of this that is going on is what today is. i find it to be one of the most amusing things that has happened in quite some time.

today i am hoping that you call me, i miss your voice.
today i am hoping i may be able to see you for a minute, i miss your smile.
today i am hoping i will get the chance to hold your hand, i miss your touch.
tomorrow i will be hoping to do all of these things all over again, i miss your love
and forever i am hoping is something we may share together, i miss our life.

so today i woke up late, and then took a shower, walked to paulas and she wasnt home, so now im here, at the library, i knew i was going to end up here today. and im glad i did, i guess, not that it matters really, but email is cool.

oh and Missy, not missy here, but missy my pen pal.. i lost your address, i wrote you back a long time ago, but your address has disappeared, so please email it to me again

and now im off, hoping to find her and sweep her off her feet once more.

-lex

I'm saying this once, and never will your name be mentioned again.
Tonia, leave me alone, stay out of my life, and enjoy the joke of a life you have created w/o me. im happy, im free, and id like to keep it that way.

*crosses fingers
i hope she says yes.. dear god please let her say yes.
i hate what i have done in my past, if i could change it i would, but unfortunately thats not possible. 
but i can say this
and i mean it from the bottom of my heart, w/all that i have, w/my every breath
i will not stop fighting for you
i will love you always
you are my angel, my world, your the reason i cant sleep at night, the reason i cant wait to get up in the morning.
you make me want to be everything i never thought i could be and more
you show me that life matters, that there is a point for me to be here on this earth
i have never been able to find the words to tell you this, to tell you how much i adore your smile, how bad i want to hold you in my arms until the world ends.. and after that, to show you that you are the most amazing woman to have ever lived, to have every taken a breath, until i met you i felt nothing but sorrow, until i made you laugh and heard how adorable it is, i thought noone could make me smile for real
you show me that fighting for that one last chance you need is worth every sentance, every word, every breath
for you i would swim the deepest ocean, climb the highest mountain, fight the biggest beast.
for you i would sell my soul to satan personally, if it meant i could hold you in my arms
nothing in this world makes me feel as amazing as you can, noone on this earth could bring this much joy into my life


for you i will capture the sun, reel in the moon, and single handedly pick up every star in the sky, so that i may wrap them all individually and give you one for every day that you allow me to love you, and 2 for every day that you arent sure

i just need to say this, and then i will end for now, so until next time, remember my angel
I Love You and will do anything to see that bright smile show 

-Lex
finally expressing my true feelings, finally telling you that you are everything and so much more

this read only mode thing is really starting to get to me
fuck!
every fuckin time i try to write anyone it says i cant
fuck it all!

blah,i hate today, i just want to blast it away
1 good thing has happened so far, lets hope that turns into more
otherwise, the bad has dominated big time
ok, so last night was the best night that i have had in months.. if you dont know why already, then im sure you dont care.. but yes, i had an amazing night!

so a very close friend of mine asks me out in a note last night at the table while we play a casual game of yahtzee, its not that i dont want to say yes.. but shes not who my heart desires, how the fuck do you tell someone that, without breaking them, and without losing the friendship.. damn you women!
-the one i want wont return my calls and the ones i dont wont leave me be.

*sigh, she even knows im in love w/someone else, its like she doesnt care? 
blah.. why cant you just call me back? why cant you just be who you used to be? why are you so differnt? so not you?
i hate this

*you should let me love you



*this is my sad face :'( ... see, its sad

I think i may just go back to the quad cities today..
i see no point in being here 
if i had to believe you or someone that didnt know you.. i think id believe you
and if someone made that up about you i would jack themin the face for saying it
but whatthefuckever
im sick of fighting for something that doesnt want to fight back
and im just sick of everything

well, i think i may be right when i say this, but i guess i'll never know..

you know you've made a wrong fucked up turn and your in the ghetto when..
-you see a drug deal happening and noone even pays attention
-a cop speeds by, and slams on his breaks to smile and wave at you, most likely because you are the only white person he has seen in years that wasnt a rotting corpse or a wigger.
-and last, but definitly not least, you see an old nigger outside shoveling his sidewalk with a fucking GARDEN SHOVEL!

so yeah, iwent to my TASC appt. today. i asked them how to get here(to the library) and they gave me ass backwards directions and i somehow ended up in niggerville. i dontknow about you, but normally when someone says go straight until a certain street.. that doesnt require several turns in the process. damn them. at least i had my faithful piece of shit cdplayer and my scratched up demanufactured cd.

other that today, nothing new is really going on. im in the qcs, i fucking hate it, i am going back to dixon this weekend.. and oh yeah, how silly of me, i almost forgot..
I MOST LIKELY WONT HAVE TO GO BACK TO THE HALFWAY HOUSEEE!!
hellfuckinyes
i cant wait till next week to find out for sure!~
oww!


well thats the best news i have, so nothing else matters
keep smokin-keep tokin-oh and drink a beer too!

I<3girls
-lex



oh wait wait waiiit a second
have all of you heard the latest cool shit
this chick, Adrianne Reynolds got all fucked up.. these kids like beat her ass and choked her.. THEN they decided to burn her, and THEN cute her up.. now i dont know about the rest of you about this either.. but.. 
if i were Sarah Kolb or Cory Gregory.. i would have done that.. Backwards!
god if you hate someone, and your stupid enough to attack them in broad daylight at a fucking taco bell.. at least make them suffer like mofos.. and if you want to ditch body parts.. ditch them in the water god.. at least then most of your evidence can be left behind..

however i can say.. it does suck and stuff.. i shouldnt find it humerous.. but i cant help but laugh every time i turn on the news.. but i dont think its at her death.. i think its at the stupidity of her attackers..

god people are stupid
im home for a short time, its great, i just miss everything from being home, except a psychotic mother,but she means well,sowhatever

mayn. my fucking knee hurts so bad, i fucked it all up the other night..
grr
i walked 2 miles in the cold, to find out i had 3-4 more left. bullshit i tell ya, so then i bust my knee on the table in shell. then the cop came and picked me up to give me a ride home, and i busted my shit again in the back of the car.. god it sux.. i think i broke it.
well imma go. 
just letting yall know whats up.. 
i go back to the lodge in 24 days. so freedom until then.. yayness.
too bad it has to end
AGAIN
its like they just dont want me to have a life i swear.
well party at my trailor this weekend for whoever cares to come
its kinda cold, but not near as bad as it was before lol

later homies and niggers
-lex

i just got kicked off of the computer at the other library, so nowim here at the other library, tis so grand to live in such a nice vast area of libraries. damn them for not letting me have my dew tho.. damn the fuckers, i need my dew.. this morning i had to bum 50 cents like usual to get my pop and mary(the counselor) decided to be a smart ass and tell me that i didnt 'need' a pop, i just 'want' it bad.. so i proceeded to ask her if she wanted to see my dew fit in the morning.. she laughed, so i started my rioting, ... she gave me a dollar. lol. gotta have my dew man.. like that comercial where the guys stops the guy in the car freakin out and proceeds to ask him if he wants to 'go halfsies' on a dew.. damn right 

so i just walked like a mile to this other library, it was rather fun and interesting.. first i stopped in at the adult video store.. yay for porn, but damn them for not having sex toys and just shitty porn.. so i asked her if all they have is vids, and they surprisingly she says no, but if you walk two blocks down to their other store that they have them.. so i did, since it was on the way anyways.. they had some cool shit.. i guess 'the rabbit is out .. teddy is the new rabbit
speaking of..
i hate pink.. why is everything all of a sudden fucking pink
god
lame
why cant it just be black and red
like evil and blood
together = hate
blargh

so im listening to the newest slipknot.. its decent, i like it, but it just doesnt sound like slipknot to me
oh and guess what

anyways point of this entry:
explanation of things
i know that many if not all of you are confused by what is going on right now w/me and life and shit.
so this is how it is:
Im still me, but ill never be how i used to be.
Yes i do drink sometimes and like to get fucked up, but no i am not going to be fucked up 24-7 anymore, that life is over now, its time i grew up and did something else.. like living

so for that i am thankful
weed is still great and so is beer, but thats not all there is to life, i just had to come to that realization on my own and in my own time.
so yes, things are going to be somewhat different, but hopefully in a good way.
i just see life in a different light now.
